channel.title: JANOME on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in JANOME on Some Title

item.title: For those who have installed janome properly with Python but get an error
item.description: Janome, a python package for natural language processing. pip install janome Then install it as usual and execute! When……… ModuleNotFoundError: No module named'janome.tokenizer';'janome' is not a package Such an error. I installed it properly… To those who Maybe you didn’t name the file with that code “janome.py”? I just changed it to another letter and it worked without error.
